SCRIPT.MSCRI:
$errors = 0 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY !-----------Building command arguments------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_SSH_PARAM : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** SHOW ARP TABLE ACTION EXECUTED ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** SHOW ARP TABLE ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
: SET &UC4RB_SSH_COMMAND# = "show arp" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_RUN_COMMAND@WIN if(!$?) { $errors = 1 } !------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
: SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT# = "" : IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &NL# = UC_CRLF() : SET &FLAG# = 0 : SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS", , "REP",) : PROCESS &HND# : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : IF &VALUE# EQ "UC4RB_SSH_COMMAND_STATUS::=SUCCESSFUL" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF
: IF &FLAG# EQ 0 : SET &FLAG# = STR_FIND(&VALUE#, "OUTPUT:") : SET &VALUE# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&VALUE#, "OUTPUT:", "") : ENDIF
: IF &FLAG# NE 0 : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT#, &VALUE#) : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT#, &NL#) : ENDIF
: ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
: ENDIF : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT#,,WORKFLOW
